about_the_game:
Wrenched is a thrilling 3D bullet hell platformer that puts you in the shoes of Carley, armed with a giant Wrenchsword, as you navigate a dangerous post-apocalyptic world filled with killer robots. Go out on a mission to save your brother by recovering 12 essential parts, unfortunately still stuck inside colossal killer machines. If only you had a way to get them out!

BRING YOUR SWORD TO A GUN FIGHT


Go metal to metal with a wide variety of enemies, and experience an exciting twist to traditional bullet hell combat as you try to engage enemies armed with blasting artillery with your giant wrenchsword.

OUTRUN BULLETS… AND ROBOTS

Platform your way through treacherous terrain, evade traps, and strategically use the environment to gain the upper hand against the enemies. Precision and agility are your allies in this dangerous world.

FIGHT BOSSES!

Face boss encounters at the end of each level, where your survival and close-quarters combat skills will be put to the ultimate test. Keep moving and try to get close to make them taste the metal of your blade and reveal the hidden part inside.

EXPLORE A RAVAGED WORLD

Explore a flooded abandoned city, a makeshift floating settlement, an abandoned factory and a dangerous scrapyard. Search for their hidden paths, buildings, and secluded platforms to find secrets and shortcuts!



Each area brings unique quests and characters to meet. Infiltrate a band of Underground Survivors or fight the mythical scrappers in between mountains of junk. You’ll never know who you run into, or who you can trust!

RETURN FIRE!

One benefit of a Robot Uprising? They might leave behind some cool tech!
Jump into a fighter jet and a tank to blast your way through enemies and give them a taste of their own bullets.

FORGE YOUR PATH OF POWER

Collect scraps by defeating foes, scavenging the environment, and completing quests. Use them to craft over 17 unique upgrades, enhancing your abilities, improving your stats, and unlocking powerful new attacks.

DEVELOPMENT

As of this moment, Wrenched is still in development and a lot more exciting features are on the horizon! If you would like to help make Wrenched the best game possible and give your input consider joining our Discord server.

If you’d like to stay up to date on development and watch devlogs, or catch a live Stream where I work on the game, consider subscribing to my Youtube channel!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240 (2 * 3400); AMD FX-4300 (4 * 3800)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 Ti (1024 VRAM); Radeon HD 7750 (1024 VRAM)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Wrenched is a 3d bullet hell platformer where you dodge bullets and destroy robots with a giant sword! Explore a post-apocalyptic wasteland, meet its survivors, hijack vehicles and platform your way through dangerous areas! All to get parts from the guts of giant killer robots!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch
